alert.note: Alert for Clay; Craighead; Cross; Greene; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 3:03PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of East Arkansas, Southeast Missouri and West Tennessee. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 1 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Craighead; Cross; Greene; Mississippi; Poinsett
